criteria_definitions.cost_of_living: Overall cost of living compared to national average (1.0 = very affordable)
criteria_definitions.housing_affordability: Housing costs relative to median income (1.0 = very affordable)
criteria_definitions.climate_rating: Overall climate appeal and comfort (1.0 = excellent climate)
criteria_definitions.weather_consistency: Predictability and stability of weather patterns (1.0 = very consistent)
criteria_definitions.job_market: Employment opportunities and job growth (1.0 = excellent job market)
criteria_definitions.tech_industry: Presence and strength of technology sector (1.0 = major tech hub)
criteria_definitions.remote_work_friendly: Infrastructure and culture supporting remote work (1.0 = excellent for remote work)
criteria_definitions.urban_density: Population density and urban development (1.0 = well-balanced density)
criteria_definitions.suburb_quality: Quality of suburban areas and family neighborhoods (1.0 = excellent suburbs)
criteria_definitions.state_tax_burden: Overall state tax burden inverted (1.0 = low taxes)
criteria_definitions.sales_tax: Sales tax burden inverted (1.0 = low/no sales tax)
criteria_definitions.property_tax: Property tax burden inverted (1.0 = low property taxes)
criteria_definitions.school_quality: Public school system quality (1.0 = excellent schools)
criteria_definitions.university_access: Access to higher education institutions (1.0 = excellent university access)
criteria_definitions.natural_disaster_risk: Overall natural disaster risk inverted (1.0 = very low risk)
criteria_definitions.hurricane_risk: Hurricane and tropical storm risk inverted (1.0 = no hurricane risk)
criteria_definitions.earthquake_risk: Earthquake risk inverted (1.0 = no earthquake risk)
criteria_definitions.public_transport: Quality of public transportation system (1.0 = excellent public transport)
criteria_definitions.walkability: Pedestrian-friendliness and walkable neighborhoods (1.0 = highly walkable)
criteria_definitions.car_dependency: Need for car ownership inverted (1.0 = low car dependency)
criteria_definitions.healthcare_access: Access to healthcare facilities and services (1.0 = excellent healthcare access)
criteria_definitions.hospital_quality: Quality of hospitals and medical facilities (1.0 = excellent hospitals)
criteria_definitions.cultural_scene: Arts, culture, and entertainment offerings (1.0 = vibrant cultural scene)
criteria_definitions.restaurant_diversity: Variety and quality of dining options (1.0 = excellent restaurant scene)
criteria_definitions.nightlife: Entertainment and nightlife options (1.0 = excellent nightlife)
